scripts.say: BOOOOOM!
This is my chance...!
That's enough, Noshiro! Step back!
A-Akagi...?! Very well, I shall...
Goodness gracious, it sounded like the Sirens were attacking us... What are you doing, Eugen?
Thanks for saving me, I suppose. I came here as a peaceful tourist, hoping to get a closer look at the Sakura Empire's fine traditions.
But if you hadn't showed up, this girl would've turned me into mince meat.
If that really is true, then we are honored to know that Noshiro fought THE Prinz Eugen face-to-face and nearly defeated her.
Let's not beat around the bush. You were trying to sink her, weren't you?
Of course not, I came here just to enjoy myself. Guess I must have struck a nerve.
Akagi, I nearly defeated her!
There is no "almost" here. You either defeat someone, or you don't. She could've sent you straight to the drydock with just a single volley.
What you saw wasn't a chance to defeat her, it was a deceptive maneuver to lure you within range of her guns.
What?! ...I apologize, Akagi. I lost control over myself.
She shouldn't have escalated it after Eugen provoked her, but I can't blame her for doing so
If it were Hipper, she would've exploded with rage after Eugen's first remark. Noshiro, by comparison, lasted much longer before retaliating.
Heheh, I'm sorry. I can't stop myself from poking fun at people who take themselves too seriously.
Let's make it up to you with a little gift. If you'd like one, that is. Perhaps you wouldn't?
There is no need. I am also to blame for escalating the situation. And for that, I sincerely apologize.
If you don't mind me asking: I noticed you two arrived here quite late. You didn't get lost on the way here, did you?
Lost isn't the right word. Your waters are unfamiliar territory to us, that's all. It wasn't easy to find our way here.
...Pardon? I stood and waited by the barrier's entrance, as promised. I'm not sure how you could've missed me...
Ah, of course it wasn't...
Given that we are allies, what need is there to hide things from us? Let me rephrase: HOW did you get lost on the way here? Could you please tell me?
Hah, it's no use to try hiding the truth from you, I suppose.
Let me tell you then. We...
Are starving! Too hungry to think straight!
Indeed. We're so hungry that we're about to collapse from exhaustion.
*Sigh*...
Understandable. We can't let our dear guests go hungry. Noshiro, would you please guide them inside the island?
After all, we wouldn't want them to miss the ritual...
